entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1400 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 1000 metres in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
